alert.note: Alert for Anoka; Carver; Chisago; Hennepin; Isanti; Mille Lacs; Sherburne; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:33AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hennepin, central Wright, southeastern Mille Lacs, southwestern Chisago, Anoka, Isanti, Sherburne and central Carver Counties through 915 AM CDT... At 833 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buffalo, moving northeast at 80 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... St. Michael, Otsego, Big Lake and Albertville around 845 AM CDT. Elk River and Zimmerman around 850 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include St. Francis. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 133 and 138. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 186 and 205. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 196 and 217. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 127 and 140. U.S. Highway 169 between mile markers 159 and 184. U.S. Highway 61 between mile markers 163 and 164. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for central and east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Anoka; Carver; Chisago; Hennepin; Isanti; Mille Lacs; Sherburne; Wright
